item.title: Spanish Omlette
item.description: Ingredients: 500g new potatoes (peeled) 1 white onion 150ml Extra Virgin Olive Oil 5 / 6 eggs Method: Cut potatoes into thick slices Chop / slice onion Heat oil in a LARGE frying pan, add the potatoes & onion and stew gently, partially covered, for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally until the potatoes have softened. Strain potatoes and onions through a colander into a large bowl (set strained oil aside).
